RECORD.TEXT: 49020928 448922 Discharge Summary DIS 01/11/1990 Report Status : Unsigned 01/22/1990 HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : She was referred for laser angiography in 11/89 , but it was not done secondasry to extent of disease . PAST MEDICAL HISTORY : She has a history of lymphangitis left arm . History of migraine , history of left shoulder bursitis . She has never been on steroids . PAST SURGICAL HISTORY : Dilt 60 b.i.d. , Lopressor 50 b.i.d. , Motrin 800 t.i.d. decreased from q.i.d. , Zantac prn . 1-2 packs per day . The patient underwent coronary artery bypass grafting x 2 with bilateral mammary arteries on 1/12/90 . LMA to RCA , LMA to LAD . The patient was without operative complications . She was continued on Lopressor 50 b.i.d. It was recommended that her Lopressor dose be increased to 75 b.i.d. She was digitalized and due to refractory a-fib on the Lopressor dose and the atrial fibrillation resolved . She is currently in sinus rhythm at a rate of high 70's . She was assessed by Holter and the results are pending as well as echo to assess LV function . She is to be discharged on 1/21/90 without her digitalis per recommendations of Cardiology . DISPOSITION : Meds on discharge are Ecotrin 1 tab q.d. , Motrin 800 mg q.i.d. , Lopressor 100 mg b.i.d. She may or may not be started again on a low daily Lasix dose of 20 mg q.d. D : Batch : 2254 Report : A6809B1 T : 01/23/90 Dicatated By : ELDJOH LARGE , M.D.
